Summary Note:
Andersen Friis and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Andersen Friis is a 49 year old Venture Capitalist from Denmark.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Andersen Friis is currently divorced. His children are named Karen and Sofia.
Education Background:
Andersen graduated from Aabenraa Gymnasium in 1995.
Andersen completed his university education at University of Copenhagen in 1998.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 25 years, Andersen Friis brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Andersen Friis began his professional journey as a Research Scientist at Bavarian Nordic A/S in 2000, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Biotech Startup Founder at Novo Nordisk A/S, where he continued to grow professionally from 2004 to 2006.
He spent 2 years working as a CEO at Bavarian Nordic A/S, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
He appointment as a Venture Capitalist at Genmab A/S in 2009 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 5740000 DKK.
